short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pokemon Chibi Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Pokemon Chibi background. Custom Pokemon Chibi wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhanced Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Pokemon Chibi wallpapers every time a new tab is opened.
2. Customize your Pokemon Chibi background with options to randomize or set favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search Bar.
4. Quick links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down tasks.
7. Quick navigation to frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access favorite websites quickly.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Simplified sharing options for social media.
13. Immediate access to download wallpapers.
14. One-click entry to gaming portals.
15. Activate interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Pokemon Chibi new tab.
